title: Update SOP-001 for simplified routing flags

comment:
## QA Pre-Review of CR-003

### Frontmatter Violation (SOP-001 Section 5.4)

The document body contains metadata that must be removed per SOP-001 Section 5.4 Document Content Standards:

- Lines 7-9: Version, Effective Date, and Responsible User fields must be removed (this metadata is managed by .meta sidecar files)
- Lines 88-93: Revision History table must be removed (history is managed in .audit trail)

Quote from SOP-001 Section 5.4:
> Documents shall contain content only. The following metadata elements shall NOT be manually inserted into document bodies: Version numbers, Effective dates, Responsible user identifiers, Revision history tables

### Incorrect Section References

Section 2 (Scope) cites incorrect section numbers for SOP-001. The correct mappings are:

| Document States | Incorrect | Correct |
|-----------------|-----------|---------|
| Routing commands | Section 5.4 | Section 9.1, 9.2 |
| Workflow diagram | Section 6.1 | Section 10.2 |
| CLI Reference | Section 8 | Section 13.2 |

### Technical Content

The proposed simplification is technically sound. The inference logic correctly maps document status to pre/post phase, and the rationale is valid.

### Required Actions

1. Remove lines 7-9 (Version, Effective Date, Responsible User)
2. Remove lines 88-93 (Revision History table)
3. Update section references in Section 2 to match actual SOP-001 structure
4. Check in revised document and re-route for pre-review

CR-003 is well-structured and addresses a legitimate documentation gap. The frontmatter follows SOP-001 Section 5.1 requirements. Section references (9.1, 9.2, 10.2, 13) are accurate - verified that SOP-001 currently contains deprecated explicit routing flags that need updating. Execution plan is clear and follows proper workflow. Recommend approval.

## Post-Review: Execution Verification Complete

### Execution Verification

All execution items from CR-003 Section 4 have been verified:

| Item | Status |
|------|--------|
| Section 9.1 routing commands updated | VERIFIED |
| Section 9.2 approval commands updated | VERIFIED |
| Section 10.2 workflow diagram annotated | VERIFIED |
| Section 13.2 CLI Reference updated | VERIFIED |
| Section 13.5 lifecycle commands updated | VERIFIED |
| SOP-001 v8.0 is EFFECTIVE | VERIFIED |

### Changes Verified in SOP-001 v8.0

1. **Section 9.1** (line 359): Now shows simplified `--review` flag with inference note
2. **Section 9.2** (line 391): Now shows simplified `--approval` flag with inference note  
3. **Section 10.2** (line 599): Diagram includes explanatory note on CLI inference
4. **Section 13.2** (lines 697-698): CLI Reference shows pre/post inferred from status
5. **Frontmatter**: revision_summary accurately describes the change

### Recommendation

Execution complete and successful. CR-003 may proceed to post-approval and closure.
